generated.html:
Installation

Installation

Install Homebrew

Hit command+space on your keyboard then type "Terminal" to open the terminal. Once it is open, paste in the following line, and hit enter.

/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"

When it asks for your password, type in your login password and hit enter. Hit enter again when it asks you to.

Wait until it is done running before continuing.

Install Node.js and NPM

After homebrew is done installing, then copy and paste the following command into your terminal and hit enter.

/usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"

Again, type your password and hit enter when necessary.

Once that is done running, copy and paste the following command into your terminal and hit enter.

brew update

Next, copy and paste the following command and hit enter.

export PATH="/usr/local/bin:$PATH"

And finally, copy and paste the following command and hit enter.

brew install node

Install Parcel

Last but not least, copy and paste the following command and hit enter.

npm install -g parcel-bundler

And now everything is installed!
